```scss
// Property: decelerationRate
// Description: The deceleration rate of the ScrollView.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.ScrollView
'.deceleration-rate-scroll-fast': { decelerationRate: Ti.UI.iOS.SCROLL_DECELERATION_RATE_FAST }
'.deceleration-rate-scroll-normal': { decelerationRate: Ti.UI.iOS.SCROLL_DECELERATION_RATE_NORMAL }
```
